main_definition: Not at any time; not ever.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Absolutely no chance or possibility of something happening
meanings_and_examples.example: I will never forgive him for what he did.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not in a particular time period; not yet, at present
meanings_and_examples.example: I have never tried sushi before.
Never underestimate the power of love and kindness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In no way, shape, or form; without any doubt
meanings_and_examples.example: She will never be able to do that on her own.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not used in a certain situation or context
meanings_and_examples.example: I've never been good at public speaking.
